oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Farmers' approaches to ecological agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vartdal, Barbro
Løes, Anne-Kristin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three categories of organic farmers are described; the ecosopher, the antroposopher and the reformist, the latter being locally oriented whereas the two first catergories were more globally oriented. Conversion to organic agriculture is described as a process of social adaptation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vartdal, Barbro and Løes, Anne-Kristin (1995) Farmers' approaches to ecological agriculture. Ecology and farming (9, May 1995), pp. 20-22.
